name: Tony Hawk: Shred
description:
Tony Hawk: Shred is a sports-arcade game developed by Robomodo. It came out on 26-10-2010. It was published by Activision Blizzard. On review aggregator Metacritic, Tony Hawk: Shred has a score of 54. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Tony Hawk: Shred is available on PlayStation 3.
